message.name: ERR_MEMBERCERTFICATION_FV_CERTIFICATION_TYPE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The certification type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_MEMBERCERTFICATION_FV_DATE_OF_ISSUE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The Date of Issue must be entered.

message.name: ERR_MEMBERCERTFICATION_FV_DELTETED_CERT_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: This member certification has already been deleted, it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_MEMBERCERTFICATION_ALREADY_EXIST
message.locale: The member certification for %1s , %2s, issued by %3s already exists.

message.name: ERR_MEMBERCERTFICATION_FV_PROVIDER_MEMBER_NOT_ACTIVE
message.locale: The provider member is not 'active', the member certification cannot be entered.

message.name: ERR_MEMBERCERTFICATION_ISSUE_DATE_MUST_BEFORE_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: Date of Issue must be on or before current date.

message.name: ERR_MEMBERCERTFICATION_ISSUE_DATE_MUST_BEFORE_EXPIRY_DATE
message.locale: If Date of Expiry specified, Date Of Issue must be earlier than or equal to the Date of Expiry.

message.name: ERR_MEMBERCERTFICATION_ISSUE_DATE_UPDATED_CONSIDER_UPDATE_EXPIRY_DATE
message.locale: The Date of Issue has been updated to %1d, Consider updating the Date of Expiry, %2d.

message.name: ERR_MEMBERCERTFICATION_FV_ISSUE_DATE_MUST_BEFORE_EXPIRY_DATE
message.locale: The Date of Expiry, %1d, must be on or after the Date of Issue, %2d.
